website_summaries.verdict: Take stand-up paddleboarding to the next level with this versatile, adaptable tool.
pros: This paddle covers all the necessary bases with an aluminum shaft, nylon composite blade, and comfortable ergonomic handle
Height adjustment is a snap with an intuitive paddle clip
Customize the paddle to your style with various options like 2- and 3-piece designs as well as several colors
cons: Some users noted corrosion after exposure to salt water

customer_reviews.title: Received paddle and it seems sturdy enough, and light
customer_reviews.text: Received paddle and it seems sturdy enough, and light , and I also like the blade.The only reason I don't give it a five star is because there's a small play between the two pieces steaming from the locking mechanism , apparently the knob that locks the two parts together fits slighly loose in the holes.Dont know how much this will bug me when in the water, also don't know if all their paddles have the same problem or just mine.
customer_reviews.author: B. lostalo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: So this paddle shocked me to say the least. I like to think I rip it up pretty good on my paddle board and I am used to really durable carbon fiber paddles and was skeptical that this was plastic and alloy. The plastic handle feels really cheap in your hands. Nevertheless, this bad boy holds up. It's super light and allowed me to shred likenive never shredded before. Solid solid paddle very pleased with this. I wouldn't ride giants with it but I was tearing up 4 - 5 footers all day with it.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Better than the expensive paddles
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my extra paddle board for friends to use and bought an expensive one as my main..... But I now use this as my main paddle, it's fantastic... Lighter than my fiberglass paddle and paddles better and faster than the fiberglass.... Will be buying another one of these for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kstrong

customer_reviews.title: Very nice paddleboard paddle
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is made by a privately owned, American company. The paddle floats as promised, making it a great replacement from the one I had that didn't float. The adjustment is very simple, once you know the trick. I wish there had been better instructions, and I worry about someone using my paddle and breaking it as they try thoughtlessly to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie A. Coblentz

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle for me.
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is just what I wanted. It is light and FLOATS! I am just starting and I was not sure exactly the length I would want in a fixed high dollar paddle, so I will discover the best length for me with this adjustable paddle and buy a much better ( and more expensive ) paddle with time.
customer_reviews.author: Porsche Man

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle for the money
customer_reviews.text: I got the 2 piece paddle rather than the 3 piece after emailing Surf and Snow Warehouse. They responded to my questions within a day, and confirmed what I suspected, that the 2 piece paddle is slightly sturdier than the 3 piece. If you're not going to be traveling with the paddle and need to break it down, you should get the two piece. It seems very well made and is a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Capashops

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, priced right & delivered on-time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to display with a mannequin and a SUP in a liquor store. I purchased the 3-piece version. Seems to be well made. I really only cared that it showed up on-time and it did. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in NC

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price!! I used my paddle for the first time yesterday and it works great. I handle is comfortable to hold for me especially because I have wrist issues. It is easy to adjust to the correct height and even comes with a guide to help you figure out the correct height. The paddle is designed perfectly for all day use, my arms are not sore like when I use other paddles. The best part is the owner personally emailed me to let me know about the return policy and if I had any questions no matter how small to let him know. This is a company that cares about their products and customers.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Paddle is light enough and short enough for my 14yr old boy to use. Extends to comfortable length for a 6'2" guy to use as well. Excellent paddle, at this time I see no need to pay a lot more for lighter weight.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dougal

customer_reviews.title: Great Paddle
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle and it floats like it says it does. Who would have thought they even made paddles for water use that sink? We found out the hard way when the paddle that came with our board sunk right away to the bottom of the lake to never be found. Thank you for a great paddle and great service!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this paddle.
customer_reviews.text: Used this paddle all summer. Lots of use. It’s a great buy for the money and my favorite paddle we own. The wide paddle is shaped for optimal water movement. Floats and easy to adjust size. Since we are in salt water it’s nice to break it apart to clean and put together no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Fireballjess

customer_reviews.title: Love the adjustable length
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this paddle! While many people talk about how great it is for travel - we love the options for adjusting length for my kiddos. Both 7 and 9yos have enjoyed our new SUP and this paddle makes it easy for everyone to use
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie

customer_reviews.title: Takes a few minutes to figure how to adjust length.
customer_reviews.text: I needed inexpensive paddles for the grand kids. I used one yesterday for the first time and once I figured out how to adjust the length it worked just fine. It could use instructions on how to adjust length.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben J Trane Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This paddle has exceeded all my requirements for a DEPENDABLE paddle. My original "own the wave" paddle had over 800 accredited miles on it. After three years of hard use, the handle finally gave in. I do a lot of back-country touring along with fresh/saltwater fishing. The paddle is your "engine" that brings you back home! This product is fabulous. I ordered another one the next morning. This company stands behind their products! The customer service went above and beyond for me. Thanks Surf and Snow warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Chockley

customer_reviews.title: Good paddle for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife’s paddle board and really have no complaints. Great quality for the price. She used it the whole past summer with no issues at all. I will buy this again when we get a second paddle board.
customer_reviews.author: Ben_E

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the wife who just took up paddle boarding. She love it. No complaints and they are adjustable for length.
customer_reviews.author: Esox07

customer_reviews.title: Very timely delivery
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, the paddle showed up within 2 days of being ordered. Our grandkids have not used it yet but were very happy to know that it arrived. A+ so far.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: It floats. It's adjustable. It got me on the water. It's flexing a bit, but it's not a race paddle. I've got it on the tallest setting, and I paddle aggressively. Nothing bad,but if you're a newbie or seasoned cruiser paddleboard enthusiast you'll never notice.
customer_reviews.author: james lumley

customer_reviews.title: Solid paddle
customer_reviews.text: New to paddleboarding. This paddle seems to be sturdy. It does float and is easy to adjust. For the price, it was worth it. If I get more competitive, I will have to upgrade to a lighter paddle. This paddle allows me to let the kids goof around as well without worrying about an expensive paddle.
customer_reviews.author: doctorsus

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this for our SUPs. Easy to adjust, float, and a lot cuter than some of the other paddles out there.
customer_reviews.author: Madyson McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Need to return it
customer_reviews.text: Can't get the adjustment clamp loose so it's stuck in the shortest position. I'm 6' tall. Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ann Richey

customer_reviews.title: Solid paddle!
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is very well-built, and is no heavier than my fiberglass-shaft paddle. The price was right too. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: but it arrived just as promised on time a nd very good packing. I bought it to use on our ...
customer_reviews.text: This paddle just arrived, so we haven't used it a lot, but it arrived just as promised on time a nd very good packing. I bought it to use on our recreational sup and will be used by adults and kids, s o the adjustable paddle is perfect as well as the fact it go I ate. I am very impressed with this paddle as well as the service.
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Marie Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Solid product WE are happy with it, floats and strong and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Researched many but this was affordable and it floats (has foam in top portion) easily adjustable. VERY GOOD PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Paddle!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter won a paddle board, but there was no paddle! This paddle works very well, is very sturdy, and handles the river we paddle in very well. We chose a 2-piece version because it seemed sturdier, and we weren't disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Use it for SUP’ing. Lightweight, easy to assemble, does the job well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good long length. Well built.
customer_reviews.text: I am very familiar with SUP, as Iake hollow wood paddle boards myself. This paddle is very well constructed, has excellent hight (very important) and a smooth grip on the hands. Many paddles have a clasp that rubs your hands as you extend the length. This one does not. It's perfect. The cover is good quality too. I'm very I pressed. I'll be ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Wohlgemuth

customer_reviews.title: A lot of paddle for the money
customer_reviews.text: My friend has this paddle and likes it, so I decided to get one. It is quite sturdy, even when adjusted to maximum length , which is what I require. It is lightweight, floats well, fairly easy to adjust. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good paddle
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is great because it can be broken down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: jac

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: First impressions of this paddle are fantastic. Lighter and stiffer than my old paddle. Grip doesn't seem like it will off anytime soon. The 3 piece design allows the paddle to easilly breaks down and fit in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't looking for a really high-end paddle since I'm not an extreme paddler. Since it's early in the season and the water here is still pretty cold I probably won't use the paddle for awhile, but it was delivered super fast and appears to be a little nicer than I expected, with a nice padded zipper bag to go along with it. It seems pretty light weight and it's very easy to adjust. Looking forward to warm weather and some fun on the water!
customer_reviews.author: MPB

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight paddle
customer_reviews.text: It is very light but we didn’t get to use it yet, but looks like it will do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good paddle for the price but the handles rusted and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good paddle for the price but the handles rusted and I couldn't get them open. I washed them after every ride yet I still was unable to prevent it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Samuel Gruver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to let guests use paddle board without risking expensive paddle
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I bought this paddle as a cheap version to let my nieces and nephews use my inflatable paddle board without risking my expensive paddle. It was used with glee at the beach on 4th of July and the adjustable length worked for the shortest niece to the tallest nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It arrived exactly on time - was very easily adjusted for her height and appeared to be well ...
customer_reviews.text: This was for my wife to replace one broken last summer. It arrived exactly on time - was very easily adjusted for her height and appeared to be well made - she is looking forward to using it shortly
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2 of these. During the 2nd trip out ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these. During the 2nd trip out with them, the blade portion fell off one of the paddles on the other side of the lake. The blade doesn't float when not connected to the other parts. Probably just a lemon as the button holding the blade portion was having some problems on that paddle. Will likely order another as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just received my paddle today. It was packaged very ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my paddle today. It was packaged very well and was everything I could have expected. I was curious as to how to adjust it to my height and which direction to use it. However, I received an email today from the owner with all of that and more!!! Now I can't wait to get out on the water!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rendi Guyton

customer_reviews.title: Good all around
customer_reviews.text: Bought this paddle due to all the positive reviews and that it FLOATS (unlike some others we passed over). Found grip to be comfortable and height adjustment is easy enough for my wife and I to share this paddle. We use it solely on a lake so cannot speak beyond that but it is a great solution for that need.
customer_reviews.author: BEBS

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Paddle
customer_reviews.text: This is a very very nice paddle. Better than what I saw in the stores. And it comes with a cover. Didn't see that in the stores I looked in. I tested it out last night. Very sturdy. I am extremely pleased with this purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Soosan H

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles!
customer_reviews.text: This paddle works great. So great that I bought 4 of them. I love that they adjust and that they float. I really enjoy being out on the water with these. It's just a little tough without a paddle board to stand on, but hey.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Good paddle for the price. LIghtweigt, adjustable, arrived quickly. feels sturdy, floats. What else do you need from a paddle?
customer_reviews.author: SandFleaDDH

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this paddle
customer_reviews.text: This 2 piece paddle is light for aluminum (but not as light as a composite or fiberglass paddle), it floats, the length adjusts easily, and it's quite sturdy. Good paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Allan C.

customer_reviews.title: great paddle
customer_reviews.text: haven't used it yet, but it fits together nicely... I like how light it is and the adjustable sizing and the fact that it can be carried in a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Paddle looks used
customer_reviews.text: Paddle arrived and out of box looks like it's been used/returned and then resold. I have 2 other paddles like this (other brand) that arrived looking new, so this is not a case of "that's just what the plastic looks like."
customer_reviews.author: SBM

customer_reviews.title: own the wave paddle review from northwest surfer.
customer_reviews.text: The paddle is high quality for such a great price and shows itself well with great graphic designs. Most of all, I'm impressed with the toughness, option for height adjustment, and the solid engagement of the adjusting mechanism's clip of this paddle. The paddle is also light weight and aerodynamic, making the paddling really scoot the board right along.
customer_reviews.author: JASON R BRUCE

customer_reviews.title: Good paddles
customer_reviews.text: Great paddles for the price. We've had these for a while now and they are still working as new
customer_reviews.author: Cameraman

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and the 3 part breakdown makes it easy to transport!
customer_reviews.text: I love the larger head of the paddle, I get more out of each stroke. This one breaks down into 3 pieces, which makes it much easier to store and transport, both of which I do.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, worked well
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy paddle. We liked how small it was- it fits in the bag with our inflatable SUPs and makes for a nice portable package.
customer_reviews.author: mcwdlm

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time, and I am happy with the product...would but it again, if needed. love the adjustable handle. nice..
customer_reviews.author: Dean Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Good with that price.
customer_reviews.text: Good enough with that price. I have another paddle, the price was more than $100. This paddle is slightly hevyer than that one, but no other difference. Good enough for beginner.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Comes scratched and almost looked like it was used.
customer_reviews.text: The paddle came with a couple of scratches and marks and almost looked like it was used. I used it today and it is definitely light and overall a good paddle. I does have a bit too much wiggle space when you adjust it and it makes noise.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Don't get this
customer_reviews.text: This paddle snapped in the first use. I took one powerful stroke and it snapped in half.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks perfect. Too cold to try in March but eager to try this summer. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the build quality is very nice and has areas sealed where water can get in ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement paddle for my Costco SUP board. Didn't want to spend a lot and found this one as its adjustable and floats...the build quality is very nice and has areas sealed where water can get in which my previous paddle didn't have. Surprisingly light and sturdy, very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Marquardt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good paddle especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good paddle especially for the price. Just need to make sure the bottom button pops out all the way so the paddle doesn't fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Received my paddle quickly and immediately took it out for a spin on the SUP my husband just surprised me with. I'm in love! I chose this paddle because of the ratings on how well it floats and I am very pleased with the quality and for such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Way to Go Surf and Snow
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from my first opportunity to use it. Adjusted easily, functioned great, and service was exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: top notch customer services
customer_reviews.text: paddle meets all expectations as well as information from company about their product. Can't go wrong with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Judd

customer_reviews.title: Seems good wiggles a little bit
customer_reviews.text: Breaks down into three pieces very long handle extension. Seems good wiggles a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: jake deshazo

customer_reviews.title: The paddle is very nice (I added a small piece of foam pipe insulation ...
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to see that the paddle had arrived when I returned from a grueling road trip. It enabled me to hop on my board and get a much needed paddle around the bay. The paddle is very nice (I added a small piece of foam pipe insulation for a hand grip) and it arrived exactly when promised. Great product, great service!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle, easy to stow on the boat with 3 piece construction.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun M. Langhorne

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a light sturdy paddle and it floats! Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: It even arrived on time and I predict many hours of fun with our paddle
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has proven to be everything it was described as. Durable, light weight and adjustable! It even arrived on time and I predict many hours of fun with our paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: two SUP paddles sent separately
customer_reviews.text: very happy with the purchase, ordered two one arrived within 2 days and we used it that day, lightweight, relatively sturdy for the price. the second took almost 1 1/2 weeks. would recommend vendor for their customer service
customer_reviews.author: guidance girl

customer_reviews.title: New paddle
customer_reviews.text: We just took our paddle boards out today for a little exercise. My new paddle was fantastic, and so happy to live somewhere that water sports can be year round ! The shipping was very prompt, and wrapped very safely.
customer_reviews.author: Fldoghouse

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this Love the way it adjusts since we have ...
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is everything we were looking for at a very reasonable price. The paddle that came with our board did not float but this one does. I would highly recommend this Love the way it adjusts since we have all sizes that like to use the board
customer_reviews.author: ds1972

customer_reviews.title: Excellent paddle. I had a question about the tape ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent paddle. I had a question about the tape on the paddle, and the company quickly responded. I have used it several times, and I have no complaints whatsoever. I highly recommend the paddle.
customer_reviews.author: FSUJester

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with paddle. Well made, light weight and great price. What more do you need?
customer_reviews.author: TCS

customer_reviews.title: 5 star customer service
customer_reviews.text: Such great customer service by the company. They checked with me every step of the way to make sure I was completely happy. My whole family and I are able to use the paddle, even though we are much different heights!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The paddle looks great, easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: The paddle looks great, easy to adjust, and very sturdy. Definitely a great price and the customer service is excellent as well from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: SUP paddle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, who needed a spare paddle. He compared it to a two dollar paddle and saw/felt no difference. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane O

customer_reviews.title: Responsible Company
customer_reviews.text: All goods received in a timely manner and in perfect condition. In the future I will definitely go to, "Own the Wave" for other products. Thank you very much. I am a happy paddle boarder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet cheap paddle.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try out SUPing on my extra-wide windsurf board. Saw that I could get this for $40 which is almost what it costs to rent a SUP for an hour here. Picked this over the other cheap models because it was already filled with foam to encourage flotation and I planned to use it in deep harbor water where a sinking paddle is a lost paddle. Sturdier than expected, and it came with a padded bag for the blade which wasn't mentioned in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Took 1 week to get but what a great paddle even lighter than my other one and came ...
customer_reviews.text: Took 1 week to get but what a great paddle even lighter than my other one and came with a cover. Wonderful product and would definitely would buy it again or recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The paddle shipped quickly and was in perfect condition. It is stronger that I thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: The paddle shipped quickly and was in perfect condition. It is stronger that I thought it would be but still light.
customer_reviews.author: Cari M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: much better length adj than the paddle it replaced !!
customer_reviews.author: Lewis E. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy on a paddle
customer_reviews.text: The paddle was exactly what I wanted. I immediately ordered a second paddle today.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W. Grindstaff

customer_reviews.title: Great so far though
customer_reviews.text: Really solid SUP paddle. Only used it once last season but when I use it again I'll update this review. Great so far though!
customer_reviews.author: Aussie Explorer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a very good price. Of course (Dec) has not been used yet.
customer_reviews.author: bamafan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality works good with my Connelly SUP and floats great buy!
customer_reviews.author: justina

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck! Does the job for our rental business. Much tougher than carbon fiber paddles that can't take the abuse. Not that much heavier either!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. I am going out of my way to say so. To many times just a unhappy customer will speak up. Not this time. Got it fast and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great paddles, very good quality and love that they come with a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie L Holder

customer_reviews.title: good packaging, and an e- mail to follow up ...
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for quick shipping, good packaging, and an e- mail to follow up the see if I was happy with my purchase. Very good quality product. Thank you again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle for the price and even better service!
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far but used the hell out of it. It does float and easy to use. Love the sellers attention to service. Got an email from the seller promising total satisfaction with all his contact info even before I received the paddle.. He wants to treat his customers right. So I purchased and other one from him for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd West

customer_reviews.title: Very nice paddle and easy-to-adjust length
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the package, and the paddle looks great. Exactly as described, with a little extra - it comes with a zippered fabric cover over the paddle blade! A really nice addition. The paddle's adjustable length is easy to change. It comes apart easily, too, if you need to conserve space during transport or storage. Great for the price! I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Berry Best

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you're looking for....
customer_reviews.text: It is clearly very well made and I like the cover. As expected and hoped for when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks just what I wanted but I wont be ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks just what I wanted but I wont be able to use it for another 4 months due to the ice on the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Backpack awesome. Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Backpack awesome. Light weight. Great color. Pump not perfect but gets the job done. I would, and might, buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Came with a nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Came with a nice cover, kids were able to use it with the paddle board and it floated!
customer_reviews.author: Justin D Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 110% happy with this paddle. It's easy to assemble and has a comfortable grip. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I am using this item for my ultralight seaplane. ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using this item for my ultralight seaplane. Most pilots use short stubby paddles and kneel on their pontoons. I thought, "Why kneel when I can buy a paddleboard paddle and stand ?"
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Celentano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is perfect to go with my inflatable stand up board. Packed well and shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Sturdy and feels like a quality product. Seller very attentive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's light and works great. I love the fact that the company sent ...
customer_reviews.text: Got my paddle as promise in 2 days. It's light and works great. I love the fact that the company sent me a thank you note and directions.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline K

customer_reviews.title: The paddle appears to be very good quality. It is easy to adjust the length
customer_reviews.text: The paddle appears to be very good quality. It is easy to adjust the length. The end of the paddle is bent at an angle to allow for more efficient strokes. The case for the end of the paddle is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good quality workmanship too
customer_reviews.text: It floats, it floats, it floats. Thats all I needed to hear as a kid who borrowed my last paddle sat there and watch it sink into Davey Jones Locker. Good quality workmanship too. Plus I like it being one piece too. Who would lose the other piece? Well the same jerk that let your previous paddle sink to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Paul McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle, this is my second purchase and also ...
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle, this is my second purchase and also for a good price.i will recommend this paddle to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Augusto Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: SUP paddle
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid, like the shape of the padle, adjusts easy. Will have to wait until the Spring to try it out and see if it floats but they assure me it will. Quick delivery and well packaged. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and looks like a quality paddle.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking paddle. Arrived quickly and well packaged. The kids should enjoy it with their new SUP.
customer_reviews.author: JH

product_meta.title: Own the Wave 2-Piece or 3-Piece Adjustable Alloy SUP Paddle/Stand Up Paddleboard Paddle
feature_bullets: The Own the Wave 3-Piece Adjustable Alloy SUP Paddle delivers a strong aluminum shaft, a durable nylon composite blade, and a super comfortable ergonomically designed handle. It is super light (2.1 lbs.) and is built to deliver years of fun; plus, you have the option to choose the blade's accent color. All of that at a brilliant price!

This paddle easily adjusts by popping out the paddle clip and the height range is simply huge: around 66 to 83 inches (1676 - 2108 mm) - to suit almost all paddlers. Aside from being light and durable, it can adjust more than most other paddles. The lightweight really reduces paddler fatigue and makes it easy for virtually anyone to use - important when being used by children or lighter adults (in which paddle weight really matters).

It takes just seconds to assemble or break down (with the longest side being around 900 mm / 35.43 Inches ) for more convenient storage/transport - excellent for going in the back of vehicles. Every buyer will be emailed a photographic e-guide, written by an experienced paddle boarder to introduce you more to this product. It is guaranteed to float in both salt and fresh water when the parts are together - we always recommend buying a paddle that floats. Two-piece version also available.

Buy with complete confidence, as all our products are stored and shipped quickly and reliably to you. All Own the Wave products are 100% guaranteed -- if it doesn't deliver what it is supposed to at any time within 12 MONTHS of purchase, it will be replaced or you'll be refunded -- your choice!

Thank you for looking at a product from our store, Surf and Snow Warehouse. We are a small family business that ONLY sells what we know and love -- water sports gear. We know our products, use our products, and stand behind them 100%. We are known for the great product support, advice and after-sales service we provide -- so if you have ANY questions about any of our products, please just ask.
